transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, please.
Executive: Yes, Mr. Shetty.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Hi sir, this side Pallavi from IndiaMART Noida head office.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir regarding your company Sri Pani Enterprises I called you. So you had a discussion with your account manager Kaushik.
Customer: Correct.
Executive: Right sir. So I hope everything is clear now. Video meeting the concern was regarding video meeting.
Customer: So you told him that it was I mean by mistake you have clicked that tab.
Executive: Correct.
Customer: See I thought that see I have read see when I went to your website you you mentioned that two people are interested with you if you are interested we can have a we can arrange video call.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: So I said that I don't know who are interested okay so let us have a video call karke I have pressed that one.
Executive: By mistake you have clicked that.
Customer: So after that Kaushik has clarified sir sir if any problem with the other person then we can have a we can arrange a video call meeting that is why we have kept that sir.
Executive: So actually
Customer: No issue sir. I mean everything is clear.
Executive: No no no nothing nothing.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: So regarding the services if you are facing any issue you can discuss with me.
Customer: Sure sure madam.
Executive: Okay. So sir as of now I am closing the concern and you will be receiving one feedback mail. So if you are satisfied with our services then please do share the feedback. Okay.
Customer: Ha sure madam.
Executive: Okay. Thank you sir. Thank you have a nice day. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer accidentally clicked on video call tab.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the video call feature.
- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- video call, feedback, services
